page.title: 17THE THREE CHURCHES
page.content: St Peter and Paul's Roman Cathlic church is near the A19. The priest in charge is Father Marron. The average congregation which has dropped from about 870 to approximately 470 people, comes from Heseldon, Hutton Henry, Station Town,Hart Village,Castle Eden, Hulam and Wingate.Those from Hart and Wingate come to church by special bus. St Francis Church of England is in the centre of Hutton Henry and has a congregation of 50 people.The vicar is Rev.J.Bell.There is no burial ground so it is a Chapel of Ease or daughter Church with the mother church being at Wingate. To raise funds the church organises pie and pea suppers,Spring and Summer Fayres and Strawberry Teas. Milbank Chapel,Station Town, is the only Methodist Church in the area.It has a congregation of about 50 people. The minister is Rev.G.Turner.
